MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PR8 postcode area of Southport affecting properties in Liverpool Road and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:53am on 18th December 2020.
